attributes.action: Introduce MP based solely on advocating Human, Animal and environmental rights.
attributes.additional_details:
We had an equalities Minister that did not believe in Gay marriage, and this year it was reported that Conservative ministers are to scrap key animal welfare guidance. 

It's clear there is a need to introduce an MP position who's sole task is to advocate all matters of human, animal and environmental rights on behalf of the people, animals and world that are affected by what MP's decide in parliament and beyond. The person must have a sincere wish to fight earnestly and not be swayed by bias.
attributes.background:
Introduce an MP role based solely on advocating Human, Animal and environmental rights. Ensuring that for every topic debated, law and ban imposed, that we are upholding the rights usually forgotten in the face of commercialism, industry and profit.

It's time to bring principles into politics.
